abstract: CauseWorld combines the trends of mobile, location, shopping, virtual goods and bite-size philanthropy.
snippet: CauseWorld combines the trends of mobile, location, shopping, virtual goods and bite-size philanthropy.
lead_paragraph: A cellphone app called CauseWorld has figured out a way for advertisers to turn their marketing dollars into charitable donations, and Procter & Gamble, Citi and Kraft are on board.

headline.main: An App for Donating Money While You Shop
